inclusion.criterion: 1-2 branches with the stenotic rate < 70% involved
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mildly ischemic manifestation relative to activity but relieve after rest
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no or low degree of organ insufficiency: NYHF I~II; eGFR (MRDR) ≥ 60ml/min;
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute or chronic active infections including tuberculosis, hepatitis virus, etc.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other autoimmune diseases including systemic lupus erythematosus, Behcet disease, IgG4
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: successive twice relapse occurs even after the intervention adjustment ( for the benefits of patients)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 74M hx of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD was referred to cardiology for evaluation of PVD, and on examination patient was found to have carotid bruits. Upon further review of symptoms the pt reports + Occasional dizziness, no prior syncope occasional HA, Denies CP/SOB. No sensory or motor defects.
